Love this phone. I've needed an upgrade for a while and have always liked Samsung phones. The display is large (which I like, though might not be for everyone) so perfect for streaming TV and film. The camera is really clear with lots of great settings and features. Plenty of storage for apps and is really easy to use.

Replaced a Samsung A40 so very similar except this is 5G and has a larger screen. All apps , settings data transferred across automatically so easy to switch. Ordered online and picked up a few hours later, could have got it a fair bit cheaper online from other sellers but price was competitive with the better known retail brands.
Easy to use, no problems, looks stylish and does everything I expect.

Bought 4 of them.  In many ways better than my year old S20+.  It has reasonable camera (out of the box, no need for the ongoing camera updates). It has 3.5mm accessory jack, expansion card slot (that S21+ doesn't have) and relatively fast processor.  The low display resolution doesn't mean, that your photos, or video clips have low resolution.  You can always watch them in hi-res on your tablet, or laptop.  The low screen resolution equals to lower power consumption and longer battery time. The A42 5G super amoled screen in general use (games, Youtube), is no different, from hi-res screen in my S20+.  In fact after my purchase of first A42 5G, I have reduced the resolution of my other phones, to reduce the time they spend on high speed chargers.

Great phone. It does all I needed to do. It has lots of functionalities, lots of storage and decent battery.
